publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4783 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Action on Anti-Semitism—That the Parliament notes the findings of Westminster’s All Party Parliamentary Inquiry into Anti-Semitism which was established to investigate the nature and extent of contemporary anti-Semitism throughout the United Kingdom; is disturbed at the rise in anti-Semitic incidents in the UK and the fact that this has been exacerbated by the war in the Middle East, and calls on the Scottish Executive to implement the group’s recommendations, including applying the same victim-orientated standard to identifying anti-Semitic incidents as to other racist incidents, better education about anti-Semitism in schools, a crackdown on anti-Jewish activity on university campuses, action to prevent the spread of anti-Semitic material online, the provision of funding for physical security measures at minority places of worship and the provision of funding for projects that aim to develop good interfaith and intercommunal relations.
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Fergus Ewing*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Phil Gallie*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Colin Fox*, Pauline McNeill*

S2M-4783 Mr Kenneth Macintosh: Action on Anti-Semitism—That the Parliament notes the findings of Westminster’s All Party Parliamentary Inquiry into Anti-Semitism which was established to investigate the nature and extent of contemporary anti-Semitism throughout the United Kingdom; is disturbed at the rise in anti-Semitic incidents in the UK and the fact that this has been exacerbated by the war in the Middle East, and calls on the Scottish Executive to implement the group’s recommendations, including applying the same victim-orientated standard to identifying anti-Semitic incidents as to other racist incidents, better education about anti-Semitism in schools, a crackdown on anti-Jewish activity on university campuses, action to prevent the spread of anti-Semitic material online, the provision of funding for physical security measures at minority places of worship and the provision of funding for projects that aim to develop good interfaith and intercommunal relations. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Fergus Ewing, Mr Jamie Stone, Phil Gallie, Robin Harper, Mike Pringle, Colin Fox, Pauline McNeill, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Michael McMahon*, Des McNulty*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Helen Eadie*, Karen Gillon*, Bill Butler*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Dr Elaine Murray*, David McLetchie*, Brian Adam*, Trish Godman*, John Swinburne*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-4783 Action on Anti-Semitism (lodged on 12 September 2006) Scott Barrie*
